name: CVE-2022-31772
description: IBM MQ 8.0, 9.0 LTS, 9.1 CD, 9.1 LTS, 9.2 CD, and 9.2 LTS could allow an authenticated and authorized user to cause a denial of service to the MQTT channels. IBM X-Force ID: 228335.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:mq:9.1.0.0:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:mq:9.2.0:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:mq:9.2.0:*:*:*:continuous_delivery:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:mq:9.0.0.0:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:mq:8.0.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:mq:9.1.0:*:*:*:continuous_delivery:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:linux:linux_kernel:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:hp:hp-ux:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:ibm:aix:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:ibm:i:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:oracle:solaris:-:*:*:*:*:*:-:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:ibm:linux_on_zseries:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
